definitions.definition: A deep red mineral , mercuric sulfide , HgS; the principal ore of mercury ; such ore used as the pigment vermilion .
A bright red colour tinted with orange.
A species of erebid moth , Tyria jacobaeae , having red patches on its predominantly black wings.
Synonym of dragon's blood ( “ type of resin ” ) .

main_definition: A deep red mineral , mercuric sulfide , HgS; the principal ore of mercury ; such ore used as the pigment vermilion .
secondary_definitions: A bright red colour tinted with orange.
( countable ) A species of erebid moth , Tyria jacobaeae , having red patches on its predominantly black wings.
Synonym of dragon's blood ( “ type of resin ” ) .
( Can we verify this sense?) ( in “Cinnabar Panacea ” ) The Elixir of Life .
